localTool.title: Local Code Search Tool

enum.description: Let Nuclide use any available tool

localTool.description: The chosen tool must be available in your PATH. On windows only rg is supported.

localUseVcsSearch.title: Use git/hg grep if possible on local folders
localUseVcsSearch.description: If in a git or hg repository, favor using git/hg grep over the search tool above.

remoteTool.title: Remote Code Search Tool

enum.description: Let Nuclide use any available tool

remoteTool.description: The chosen tool must be available in your remote host's PATH. On windows only rg is supported.

remoteUseVcsSearch.title: Use git/hg grep if possible on remote folders
remoteUseVcsSearch.description: If in a git or hg repository, favor using git/hg grep over the search tool above.

maxResults.title: Maximum number of results per project folder
maxResults.description: A much higher number might affect the CPU usage and the rendering of Quick Open

nuclide-quick-open-register-provider.description: Register ourselves with the quick-open package
